AurelionSol.name: Aurelion Sol
AurelionSol.title: The Star Forger
AurelionSol.lore: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his star-forging ways, Aurelion Sol will drag the very stars from the sky, if he must, in order to regain his freedom.
AurelionSol.blurb: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his...

spells.name: Breath of Light
spells.tooltip:
Aurelion Sol breathes starfire for up to {{ maxchannelduration }} seconds, dealing {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second to the first enemy hit and {{ aoemodifier*100 }}% of the damage to surrounding enemies.

Each full second of breath on the same enemy deals a burst of {{ burstdamage }} magic damage plus {{ burstbonustruedamagetochamps }} max Health magic damage and absorbs {{ qmassstolen }} Stardust if they are a champion.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Astral Flight
spells.tooltip:
Aurelion Sol flies in a direction. While flying, Breath of Light has no Cooldown, no max channel duration, and it's flat damage is increased by {{ truedamagebonus*100 }}%.

Takedowns on champions within {{ resetwindow }} seconds of damaging them refunds {{ tooltiptakedowncooldownmultiplier }}% of this Ability's Cooldown.

Recast: End flight early.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Singularity
spells.tooltip:
Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, dealing {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage per second and Dragging enemies towards the center for {{ duration }} seconds. Enemies in the center below {{ currentexecutionthreshold }}% max Health die instantly.

The black hole absorbs Stardust when enemies die within it and each second an enemy champion is inside.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}

spells.name: Falling Star / The Skies Descend
spells.tooltip:
Aurelion Sol plucks a star from the heavens and crashes it into the earth, dealing {{ maxdamagetooltip }} magic damage, Stunning enemies {{ stunduration }} seconds, and absorbing {{ massstolen }} Stardust for each champion hit.

Gathering {{ calamitystacks }} Stardust transforms the next Falling Star into The Skies Descend.

The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a constellation's worth of fury down from the cosmos, dealing {{ r2damage }} magic damage in a larger area, Knocking Up enemies hit for {{ stunduration }} seconds, and unleashing a massive shockwave that deals {{ shockwavedamage }} magic damage to champions and Epic Monsters and Slows all enemies hit by {{ shockwaveslow*100 }}% for 1 second.{{ spellmodifierdescriptionappend }}
